title: Reports Generation and Download UI
description:
Create Comprehensive Reports Interface

Build a full-featured reports interface that enables users to generate, customize, and download reports in multiple formats.

Requirements:
- Implement report type selector with clear categorization of available report types
- Design filter panel supporting common filter types (date range, categories, status, search)
- Add format selection dropdown (PDF, Excel/CSV, JSON) with appropriate icons
- Create download button that generates and retrieves the report file
- Display loading state during report generation
- Show preview of report data before download (optional but recommended)
- Handle error cases (invalid filters, generation failures, timeout)
- Validate that selected filters are compatible with chosen report type
- Persist user's last-used filter preferences for convenience
- Ensure generated reports include metadata (generation date, applied filters, user info)

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Large datasets that may require pagination or chunked downloads
- Empty result sets based on filter criteria
- Expired or stale data in cached reports
- Concurrent report generation limits
- File size limits for different formats

Dependencies:
- Backend API endpoints for report generation
- File download mechanism compatible with target browsers
- Report generation library/service for different formats
